lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pissblossom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where Taliesin jumps the gun and says his phrase too late.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Way too late, man! Way too late!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome. Happy to be back. Very emotional episode last week. We're going to kick it into the next step of Vox Machina's adventure this week, and then, me, Marisha, and Taliesin will be gone next week, so there will not be progression in this current storyline. However, Liam O'Brien over there has been cracking up an awesome one-shot adventure for our remaining players and a few guests. Liam, if you want to talk a little about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll say who's coming on by. Mary Elizabeth McGlynn and Ashly Burch. And I don't want to spoil it, but Matt knows. It's different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to be fun. This is Liam's brainchild, and I'm excited to see them play through it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could blow up in my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, you want to take this away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It includes two collectibles, a figure, and as always, a monthly t-shirt. I'm wearing a t-shirt. Not from this month, but from last month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got Futurama stuff on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've just saved enough money to buy a 2002 Kia Sedona with 181,000 miles on it. The transmission is going out, and it doesn't shift in the higher gears, but it is for $800 on Craigslist. Go look for it right now, and it will be yours for free, essentially, if you buy 266 subscriptions to Loot Crate. 266.67. Okay, that is

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you don't slow your roll, Loot Crate is going to poach you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't forget to use the promo code CriticalRole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. (laughs) All right, other announcements that we have. Let's see. Projects that have come up. They recently announced and put up the English cast video for Final Fantasy XV. I have the pleasure of playing Cor Leonis. It's a lot of fun. As a longtime Final Fantasy fan, being a part of this means a great deal, and I'm excited for the game that comes out in November. So if you haven't checked out the video, do so and you can watch me wax poetic briefly about my love of the series. Look forward to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Soundbiting it up in that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, man! They chose my soundbite for the end of it. I was like (explosion). Felt cool about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like you're an actor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So enjoy that, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love shooting you in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else have anything they want to announce?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're nominated for an award, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right! We just got nominated for a Streamy. A Streamy award under gaming. Games. It's awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's our first nomination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like the Kids' Choice Awards for adults.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's not. Fans don't get to vote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now decided by whatever the Illuminati Streamy committee is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, fans don't get to vote? I'm sure they can influence things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they nominated us, so we got this far because of them, and now we lose to Markiplier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Love you, Mark. We're just excited to be in that ring. Thank you guys for being so awesome and supporting us, and hopefully some of us will get to dress up fancy and show up and go home proud that we went.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll plug our other friends who are also nominated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Muzzled the Musical, which I co-created, which Ashly Burch stars in, who you'll see next week, that got nominated for best indie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Sean Becker. Who's my director for Signal Boost. All in the fam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's good. Awesome. Anything else you guys want to talk about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! In the world of sportsball, the 2016 future Super Bowl champion Dallas Cowboys are playing the Seattle Seahawks right now! So if you see me looking down, it's not because I'm not paying attention. I'm watching football.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But definitely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: More than it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody send Sam a tweet. He's going to be crying at the outset of his team. Sam, a moment of silence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's lighting the set on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam walked away so he wouldn't be on the same set as you were saying that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else have anything they want to talk about before we jump into the game?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No announcements until I get back, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is where we begin. You have now taken some time in your own respective rooms. It's still late afternoon, going into dusk. You all took some time to yourselves within Castle Whitestone to take a short rest and ruminate over these recent events and reveals. The evening sun draws close to dusk. It is your choice which you wish to do. If you wish to spend the evening resting here and then leaving first thing in the morning, that is up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taking the initiative. This one came to my room, then inside. I think we've probably been quiet for a while, staring at the ceiling, and after a while finally say: We've really fucked things up, haven't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In which particular way do you mean, aside from all of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need to tell you. I know with all that's happened, between my new patron and my sister pretending to gag literally every time we attempt to share a word together, and mostly my own being fucked up in the head for weeks now, that I've pushed all of you away. You most of all. Because I've been afraid you would-- I'm sorry. And you didn't deserve any of that. Keyleth, I need you to know, through all of that, everything, nothing has changed about how I-- We've had so many near-misses. And now, finding Tiberius. Death is unavoidable. And it's all the more reason for life to be lived. And it doesn't matter to me what this is. What we call it. If you are willing to spend some time, any time, with me, then I will simply count myself lucky to have it. You're very dear to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're talking too much. It's not like I've made myself very accessible either. It's not on you. It might be a little on you, but it's on both of us. Anyway, my point is: for the longest time, I was terrified that I was going to lose you. First to death and then to the Raven Queen, which is still kind of like death, and then ultimately to yourself. And then I had an interesting talk with Pike recently, and she said something that really stood out to me, and that was that some people just have more of themselves to give. And I realized this whole time that I was afraid of losing you to a future that ultimately has not yet been written, which is stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're ultimately right. We have nothing to lose. I love you, Vax. And I'm sorry for being me, that it took me this long to say it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sniffles) I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Me, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you. That's pretty fucking great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tackle her into a bit of a hug into the bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're already on the bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's it for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pan to the fireplace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Pan to the fireplace!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Vox Machina. Taking your time to mourn in your own interesting ways. What is your path of action? What is your course, going forward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sleeping in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think we need to spend at least the night in Whitestone and get up in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having breakfast, you can see Zahra wander in at the smell of bacon, glances over the rest of you, still holding a book at her side that she slams closed. "Oh. I'm glad to see you're all "right, and you're safe. Please tell me there's more bacon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not for long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's more coming, dear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What she said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She comes and sits down and spends breakfast with you guys, catching up on what has transpired and what your current plan of action is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Zahra, it occurs to me, you come from a family with power, connections.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kind of. Let's just say we're estranged at the moment."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're looking for any ally we could, and we were curious if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will find no allies where you're asking. Believe me, I'd be happy to offer if we "could, but no."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a feeling. It just felt worth asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. I'm going to continue with my research, since the rest of the ziggurat clan "are now scattered about or maintaining that barrier. Guess who has to do the research in the "meantime?" And she rolls her sleeves up; you can see the slightly smudged dirt across her reddish skin. She's been hard at work digging around trying to figure out what the basis of this enchantment beneath the city still is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry you can't be out having your fun, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm certain time will allow me at some point. It better. I'm going a little stir-crazy." She grabs the bacon from the table and walks out of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Kashaw around by any chance, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kashaw. Is Kashaw around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen him for a couple days. I've been underground most of the time."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course. We have to send a letter to the Slayer's Take at some point. That should happen sooner rather than later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trying to wrangle a beast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to wrangle a beast or seeing if they know of anything that's in the vicinity that we can at least feed to it in the meantime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are going to Marquet, aren't we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would hope so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what's our intent in Marquet? To get the next Vestige?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To get to the next Vestige and to perhaps make some friends. The more the merrier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the means of travel is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a sigil. We can teleport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore. Gilmore's from Marquet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a teleport sigil. This is not going to require his attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's located in Whitestone Castle, correct? The teleport sigil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually a sigil by memory that he has, and it's a spell that he casts. It's not a permanent fixture in the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we need him, but he can do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but he's concentrating on the defensive wall right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's up. As long as the dragon's not here and attacking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a renewal feature. He has to spend some time each day maintaining it. He's not stuck there the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The worst job in Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go to Marquet. Let's say Marquet takes 13 days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an awful long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree, but let's say it does. Do we know what we're doing with regards to Draconia when we come back? Do we have some sort of a plan? We're getting a beast. That's all we know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, we've got it covered. It's planned out to a T.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we even going to get a beast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Talk to the Slayer's Take and see what is already on the continent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What constitutes a beast? Because me and Keyleth can make some beasts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think a large enough beast to attract Vorugal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a triceratops?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They said it hunted something really intense recently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said they hunted remorhaz?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, they went to the ocean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I wrote it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For me. Ooh, a 19! Plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what they look like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Those are big and scary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a gargantuan monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're huge. Most definitely. They're nasty; they burrow. The actual blood within their body is heated to such a degree that even to be in a scuffle with it is to scar yourself with flame and heat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it was bored with that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want to find a creature that would threaten a medium-sized city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it wants competition.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want to wear it down a bit before we go in for the attack. We want it to be breathing heavily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And how are we going to get this creature there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to find something that's already on the continent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vorugal will go to the creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He will be happy to attack it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you put it in your necklace?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the continent. What continent? The Draconian continent?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have to go back there to search!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Slayer's Take should know. They've got contracts everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. This is slightly a better plan than I thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We thought about it a little.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six people cannot wage a war.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we should go talk to the Slayer's Take now so they can get started on this hunt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to send them a letter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A letter?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's the letter carrier and how's he going to get out of this city that's protected by an invisible wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to make Kashaw take the letter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we were last there, hadn't they talked about a brass or bronze dragon? But there are brass dragons, as you well know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, because I'm an expert.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that overkill? We'd have to convince a dragon, not capture a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would probably kill the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are we talking about capturing another dragon to fight another dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're talking about convincing a dragon to go fight this dragon that would clearly kill it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to find Kashaw and see if he would run the letter to the Slayer's Take and be our emissary and convince them to do this so that we're not doing everything ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is there anyone else who can make this message delivery faster or safer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Literally everyone. If we could find a child in a pub who could take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but faster and safer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kashaw is possibly slower than a child.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No more small boys, Percy. No more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could ask Zahra, but she's busy with research.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think Kashaw is a great people-person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to get rid of him, they would say yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He wants to help. He does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's go find Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not far from the base of the pathway into the actual city, you can see there is a series of newer-outfitted guards. They are people being trained in the force of combat. You can see that there's definitely a ramping-up of the defense force for Whitestone as a precaution.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look like townspeople?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many of them look able-bodied and people that are strong and fit, but they do appear to be civilians that have had to take up the cause just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any kids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No kids, no. They all look to be at least of strapping age, to be carrying a weapon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strapping boys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strapping. The strapping age.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we ever talk to Cassandra or anyone else about starting an alarm system here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and they were working on it already, weren't they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, they started. They are working on it now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd buy that. Yes, it was proposed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do want to maybe talk to Gilmore, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we're going to have to if we leave the city, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see on the opposite end that the person who is currently helming one section of the training is Kashaw. You can see a bunch of shield and spear fighters right now, and he's basically giving them instruction on how to use a shield defensively and the spear offensively simultaneously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's not the best messenger if he's training our armies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not an army. This is something for the population to do while they pass time. The dragon shows up, they're all going to die, no matter how many times they learn how to put the spear forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As cynical as Percy is being right now, he's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it doesn't mean that Kashaw is going to think that it's any less important, and I'm sure he might not take it as a compliment if we ask him to be the messenger boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an incredibly important mission!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not just a messenger, it's defeating a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's convincing the Slayer's Take to join.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Slayer's Take, if I recall, doesn't do things for free. We're going to have to pay for this, even though we're members.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to bring them some dragon parts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we take a contract on a really large creature, and then we let the dragon do the work for us. We get the best of both worlds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, that's very clever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We take a contract on an existing creature that we have to somehow find in Draconia.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we bring the dragon to the creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hunts them. That's what he does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not transcontinentally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't broker a fight between a huge beast and a white dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could sell tickets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you've done better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't necessarily have to sacrifice a dragon. We're fighting a war here. They're fuckers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're not talking about sacrificing a dragon. We're talking about finding a beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm talking about a dragon. Couldn't we try to talk a dragon into helping us do what we're doing? They're not all evil, are they? They're not!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but do we know of any other dragons here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then we're going to have to fucking go to the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go somewhere in the next 60 seconds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This'll be great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's talk to Kashaw. We go up and we talk to Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's great. I'm excited. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kashaw, how would you like to be anywhere else other than here right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on where and what you'd have me doing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's exactly the sort of enthusiasm I was hoping for. We have need of an emissary to the Slayer's Take. We need to convince them to help us kill the next dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Vanessa really likes you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need a big beast on Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're saying that I go back to frozen-ass Vasselheim to deliver a paper message "to the headmistress, whom already I am so happy to be away from."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. See?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I'll take it." (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are in your debt. I'll have the paper drawn up, and anything you can do to put the weight of the situation behind us and make sure they know how clear it is and how necessary this is and how desperate we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do my best to muster some semblance of emphasis."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we'll figure out ways to make sure there's money in it for them, or at least dragon parts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Give me a list of what you've got to offer. I'll bring it to them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we got to offer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have the troll dick anymore. That's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have 40 pounds of dragonhide. Black dragonhide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And white dragonhide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have white dragonhide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have white scales.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have 64 pounds of scales from me. We have four claws left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a Tome of Leadership worth 30,000 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's Keyleth's, remember? In the next century, when she's still living.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll get it back before 100 years are up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll lend it to them for 100 years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A 99-year lease.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we got umber hulk pieces, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mostly, I was thinking of also offering them whatever we can take from the dragon itself once it's destroyed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about to say, yeah, we put into the contract that it has the remains of the beast we take down, which we will take down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We keep some scales, we keep some teeth; we split it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, as a souvenir, right. Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're basically doing a contract for free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a very large creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's provided we kill it. If we lose, they get nothing. I'm just saying, from their perspective, we're offering them literally nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they lose, they don't lose anything either, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they do. They lose a contract.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But wouldn't the contract just go right back into cycle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, if the dragon kills the creature and then we all die and we can't harvest it, the Slayer's Take doesn't have anything from its previous contract.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that could happen with any contract. Any band of idiots could go die on the battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're used to having people die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fuck it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Grog's getting antsy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like this. I'm going to have it drawn up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look at Grog and see he's really bored. I pick up a wooden sword and I hit him as hard as I can on the small of his back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not going to be that hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While all this is going on, Grog, you could be training these soldiers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, train them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation, (whack) right in the knee cap, a surprisingly painful and forceful blow. It's less the strength behind it and more the precision in which it strikes you right between the kneecap and the rest of the lower half of your knee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like when a doctor hits you and your knee jumps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you're like (grunts) and you glance over and you see Vax hide a wooden sword quickly behind him as he backs away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, big guy! I know you're bored! Come on! I hit him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check. Actually, this time it's an attack roll, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit him in the nuts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. That's a 20. Oh! But it's with a stick! Just strength modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not proficient with a sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh dear. I'm going to use Luck. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You whack him. This time, it hits the meat of his thigh and has no effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I missed the nut? Ugh. Come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have a death wish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, take a swing! I'm trying to do you a favor! Come on, get it out!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What am I missing here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm seeing this going down. I've walked away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see a gauntlet on a table, and I throw it at his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll an attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a one! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see this going on, and I stand up on something, and I yell to the students--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before this happens, as you're getting up, you watch as Vax rears back, and as he throws it, (yelps) he pulls a muscle in his shoulder and it drops to the ground, and you're like (pained noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I jump up on a chair and I yell to the students: Instructor Kashaw has instructed us that this is a drill! You are to attack that man right there, that large man, as a test of your strength and training. Now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't kill them, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be awful. Wow. That is cruel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: and freeze. They all slowly look towards Scanlan and whisper among themselves, then look back at Grog and stay frozen and two creep forward for a minute. Get a little closer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your form swells into your now enlarged goliath battle-ready form, you notice a few of them start giving off this rattling metal sound as their armored knees (clanging) together. Many of them step back about ten feet, and Kashaw, who hasn't left entirely, spins around and goes: "The "gnome's fucking with you. It's fine!" He walks up to you, Scanlan, pats your arm and goes, "That was "pretty funny."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't get the people killed. I've been working on them for four days."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He wasn't going to kill-- Were you going to kill them, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Vax and I go, you were just playing around, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And in my giant state, I'm going to kick him like a soccer ball.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to dodge. Uncanny Dodge, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we'll see. Go ahead and roll an attack roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good. 32.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh. No, I didn't miss that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, I'm going to use another Luck and make him roll again and pick the lower of the two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15 on the strength check. 25.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to roll again for the hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again because he used a Luck point to force you to reroll your attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the strength roll again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The strength was 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength check was 24. So as you peek out of the corner of your eye you hear this (heavy steps) and as you try and spin and dodge out of the way instinctually--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uncanny Dodge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know and we'll get to that. Instinctually, you turn to dodge out of something Grog-sized, not giant-sized. And in that brief minute that you remember that he grew, you pause just long enough to (whack) feel the force of what feels like a giant battering ram slam into your side, sending you off your feet and arcing a good 30 feet before you (impact) tumble and skid to the ground. What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. You take 14 points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to half because you're taking Uncanny Dodge. So only seven points bludgeoning damage. You stay there for a second, stunned. You feel a bit of bile and iron taste in the back of your throat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First rule of Fight Club.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I check the Titanstone Knuckles? Have they changed now that I've kicked a friend in the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it! Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to have maintained their composure as gauntlets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's some blood and five long, dark hairs on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as a lot of the soldiers who had been watching this endeavor step even further away from Grog, and some of them begin walking off, taking their helmets off. "All right, we're done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey bonus, he's on our side. Eh? That's encouraging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all nod their heads. "Yeah, I know that. Thank god!" But they're all doing this while still locking eyes with him. "That's great." And slowly walk off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Help me up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have wings?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not going to use them right now. Just a hand. (groans) That's going to bruise. Worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I was getting so bored.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, bubby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the chances I would have at least a basic portable writing desk? They're not that complicated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A portable writing desk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16th century-style. Just something to write on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you need a writing desk for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just something with paper, pen, and something to write on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have access to a quill and ink, you have access to parchment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about a fucking clipboard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's basically a fucking clipboard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have access to that, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival de Rolo, Inventor of Clipboard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a writing desk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yes, you have access to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, what is in this letter? What are we offering them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how's the letter going?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm writing the letter up. I've basically gotten it together. I've explained the situation briefly. I assume they're aware of the war and the current reality.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And to clarify for me. We're asking them--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting there. In this, I'm asking for their assistance in killing a dragon. For this assistance, they will get all bounty of biological remnants of the dragon, with a small percentage of scales and teeth kept for us. Asking for 20 percent, but negotiable. We want them to supply either a local or give some intel into where we can find a beast large enough for this dragon to attack. Information that we have on this dragon so that they actually help us strategize any ways of defeating it, and any other help that they could give in defeating this creature. And as a token of our goodwill, we are sending them a small package of black and white dragon scales and a dragon tooth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. And make sure to include that this must all be completed within 14 days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: There's more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Asking them to help us kill a dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're asking them to find a beast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's what he said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in the letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's part of that listening thing, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did talk for quite a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a way to enchant me so that I have his voice? And then he'll listen more closely?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't answer that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish penning the letter, you read over it once, twice, make sure all the information is contained. You go ahead and grab the little bit of your offering of dragon scales and teeth. Present them to Kashaw. He takes the letter and reads it over. "Sure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we add an NDA?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a rider at the end of everything I send.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anywhere you go. Very important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good addendum. Whatever that word is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again, please?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No mention of Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have a way to get him there very quickly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Kashaw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you going to do your tree thing for me? Otherwise, I can walk, but it'll be a month and a "half before I get to shore."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to be here the rest of the day, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How will he get back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Druids. People. Wizards. Sorcerers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! We got those rocks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a really smart man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, the rock. That's a really good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but then he'll pop where we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we'll leave the rock here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to stay here at least a day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you've got friends, don't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm can figure something out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Steal an airship on your way back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Let's go to the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's walking down, at your side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you want to walk with them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Where is that coming from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he definitely has a thing for you, Vax. I have a keen eye for these things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you can't address it. You just have to let it be. I'm not going to encourage it. I'm not interested in him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see it every time. He does. He smolders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he walks with you down the pathway, having this conversation. It's that awkward, quiet about three, four minutes of walking before he goes. (sniffs) "Ugh. So when all this is over--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, come on, man. Why are you doing this to me? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, it's going to happen. Let it happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we survive all this dragon business--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Uh-huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you want to get a drink?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love drinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of a drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to approach the edge of the tree. He goes: "I think you answered your own question."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that a yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Open the damn tree."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look. You know. It's really complicated right now, and I'm trying this whole "allowing myself to feel things" thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trust me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll see you on the other side. We'll put a pin on this one. Bye, Kash. And I cast it through the tree and I push him in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're left there alone, standing in the cold Whitestone air outside of the Sun Tree. Around mid-morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Kash leave already?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, Vax, you didn't get a chance to say anything to him. I've talked to him about this. He has his eyes out on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got enough complications around me as it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a really good reader of people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dark eyeliner--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So now that that's handled, are we leaving today?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're leaving today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, one of us doesn't have any luck left, so maybe we should spend the night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got a little bit of luck. I'm a lucky guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get our luck back tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got a limited amount of time on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (knocking) No response.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaun? Shaun! It's us. Are you home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a muffled voice in the distance within the building go, "Yeah, hold on."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it sound like anyone we knew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounded like Gilmore. He's under some sort of duress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounded like he was under duress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slightly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Hold on, please." And you watch as the barrier flickers for a second and restores itself, almost like a wave of energy brought what was a slowly dwindling bit of the blue energy, now restored to its full strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's got to use the privy at some point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's probably squeezing one out. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes before the door opens again and you see Gilmore there, beads of sweat down the front of his face. He's got his fuzzy purple-blue robe wrapped around him. "My sincerest apologies, "I had to take care of the now morning ritual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you holding up, Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine. This is child's play compared to what you're having to deal with on a daily basis, "I'm sure."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! You got a whisper on a 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an early whisper. A first-hour whisper is rare.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It came at such a high speed. I wish it came so quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wish I knew more about Loot Crate right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's not just Loot Crate, Liam. It's Loot Wear. Those come in a separate bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Different than Loot Crate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's different. You can find out all about it at lootcrate.com/criticalrole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, the shirt you're wearing, Sam, is from Loot Wear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? It is? Oh my god! And I'm so handsome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anyway, back to the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can I do for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things have progressed much quicker than we expected it to, and unfortunately we are on a two-week time crunch before all hell breaks loose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, at the very least, that gives us a series of days to make the best of the time we "have. So Marquet it is. All right. Come in." He closes his robe a little bit and walks in, and you enter. You can see there's a half-drunken tea set, and he begins to walk past. "Tea, anyone?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like a loose-leaf oolong, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do what I can."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many cups are currently sitting with the teapot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, there is one cup, but as he walks by, he does this with his fingers and you watch as multiple cups drift off the shelf and find their way (cups landing) on the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How does his house look? Does it look together like it would normally be, or does it look disheveled at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes into the kitchen. He comes back out a moment later with a fresh pot of hot tea and sets it down. "All right. So this isn't going to send you to where you're going--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We literally know nothing about Marquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hot. It's dry. Bring some water if you can."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not able to leave, are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should not. Got to keep this going until Allura comes back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anyone that we can say maybe vouches for us or someone who we are against so that we can win favor with the locals? Something like a no-tail, long-tail binary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We walked into a sort of political snafu because we didn't know the lay of the land, so is there anything we should know in advance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Best I can tell you, because I haven't been there since I was very young, one: this going to "send you not to Ank'Harel itself, it's going to send you to Shandal, which is a small oasis "village a little ways south of Ank'Harel. It's where I grew up."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was that name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shandal."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shandal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will say that it has been about 15 years, so I don't quite know what to expect there. I "apologize in advance for any ensuing chaos, but it's a nice town. It's small, it's sleepy. It's "not my speed. Hence why I came here. However, in Marquet, it's mostly music, culture, fun people, "good food. Don't break the laws. Don't drink the water freely from the various channels you may "stumble across. Water there is a commodity. It is controlled and sold throughout the city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got a jug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got loads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those are the main things I can think of. I don't know what else you're really looking for there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I can tell you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cabal's Ruin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: The Den of Druja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Druyah. Drujah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Druhah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jaja.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know anything about that, unfortunately, but most folks that have "information are eager to give what they know with a little coin to grease the palm."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a little water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on who you're talking to. Anything else?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pours tea for everyone else who asked for it. And for each person that asked for a different flavor of tea, he begins to snap his fingers and the tea color changes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside of you, do you know of any very powerful merchants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One with a missing eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would definitely probably narrow it down, but none that I can remember off the top of my head."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we bring Jarett with us? Is that a thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should talk to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Shaun, you do so much for us. We do nothing for you. Is there anything we can bring back for you or messages to give to someone there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anyone you haven't seen in all these years?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes back with a small backpack made of leather and thick, light tan wool. He opens it up and reaches inside. Pulls out a small silver locket and takes it and puts it in your hand, Vex. He goes, "Just give that to them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He closes the bag and places it back in the other room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shaun, are you doing okay? You look a little worn out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "We do what we must."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could only imagine a barrier of this size of a construct can be quite taxing on one's physical energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. I guess if I had one request of all of you, this goes universally, can we end this dragon "business soon? Please? I really just want to set up shop again."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would like nothing more. I think we're on the same page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're very interested to start paying you for your service again, Gilmore, and stop expecting it for free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Because I've been keeping a tally. I don't know about you guys, but the tab is running "very deep."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, believe me. I have, as well. This locket will take a nice little chunk off of that tally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fantastic. I love it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Birds of a feather, you two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go talk to Jarett and then come back?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go talk to Jarett. We'll have appropriate clothing set up and prepare ourselves for the trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Robes and things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be here if you need me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be back in an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. You don't want the rest of your tea?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I'll drink it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any to-go cups? (laughs) Just kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now she's in casual Sherri mode. Her hair is frazzled and pulled back. Her glasses are pushed to the end of her nose, and she's carrying a bundle of groceries, various bits of produce and such. "Oh, hello, everyone. I'm bringing Gilmore "his breakfast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sherri. We asked him, but he's modest. How's he doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not that he'd tell me anything, but he doesn't have a very lengthy period of keeping this "up without him probably collapsing like he did back in the city. Just please, try to do your best to "get this over with. I'm worried. At the very least, until Allura comes back. At least they can "share the load. All right." She knocks on the door and opens it. "Gilmore? Gilmore, breakfast." The door closes behind her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, I have an idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because the Alchemy Jug can make out eight gallons of fresh water. We pour it all out and then at the end of the day it starts over, so we have eight gallons sitting in the bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, we all have water skins, don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have a spread of our survival kits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But all the same, that is a very good idea, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm surprised you even know how many eight gallons is, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, eight gallons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if we had an extra skin or something, we could trade it. We could give it away, so we should go get one, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we could give it away, give it away, give it away now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. I walk off and look for Jarett.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A rift just opened in the universe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I hope all is well on your end. Can I be of service?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can tell us all about where you're from, actually. Did you leave Marquet a long time ago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was maybe ten, nine years ago, "and it was not under the best terms. Probably would be in jail had I not got away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are not very forgiving of broken laws there, and based on certain judgments... let's "just say a slap on the wrist usually takes the wrist with it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Whatever was needed for survival."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're going there, so I'm hoping either you can give us a lot of tips so we don't run into problems, or I don't know if anyone can take your place right now. Do you want to go on a field trip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To Ank'Harel?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, I respect this. I think my strength and skill set is much better used here "than in the Scarlet Prison beneath the Cerulean Palace. I do not want to even conjecture spending "the rest of my life there, or in pieces. Also possible."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget it. We need all the knowledge in your head, in ours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what was that Scarlet Prison you just mentioned, under the what now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regardless, I would highly recommend--" He looks to you. "Don't steal anything unless you are damn sure nobody knows of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't stolen anything in years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughing) Bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me neither. (laughs nervously)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never stolen anything!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drujah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He closes his eyes a second. "That was... a very, very--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's unscrupulous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been in a tale of a one-eyed merchant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not any merchant I know, but this Den you speak of, they were a rather serious gang running "rather violent activities in the city maybe 70, 80 years ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would they have been in the walls? Is it possible to be in the walls of Ank'Harel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the outer walls? The outer walls are solid. They are thick; they are meant for defense "only. I did not run with them. I do not know anything. It was before my time, but they have not "been around for at the very least 50 years."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know who rules Ank'Harel now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is J'mon Sa Ord."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us about him? Or her, or it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is also-- and this is my personal belief-- I think J'mon Sa Ord is many people. I think J'mon "is more of an office, a station, a title that's passed on from person to person, because I've "heard referenced as a girl, I've heard referenced as a boy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like the Man in Black.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What story is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's this famous tale of the Princess Bride. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the Hand of Ord carry any symbol? Do you know of any way of identifying them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They carry ornate armor of a deep blue sapphire color, and brass."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this other city, Shumble. Humbal.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Shandal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shandal! Yes. (laughs) It's more of a podunk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A very small town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shandal is usually a small stop in case camels or "other horses have died in transit, as well as a small water stop on the way to the city."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a long trek from there to the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say maybe a day's travel."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In which direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is to the south-southwest of Ank'Harel."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On par with Emon, the city? Bigger? Smaller?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, Emon? Comparable. A bit bigger."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll make waves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Maybe we shouldn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well. We're going to have to get someone's attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a city that has no water. We shouldn't make waves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember, in all your time there, did you ever deal with-- this is completely ridiculous-- a merchant who only had one eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't recall. I've met people missing many limbs and parts of their body. Kind of "happens; it' a dangerous place, the deserts in Marquet. But there are also many people that live there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're sure we can't talk you into going? Percy's giving out titles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am absolutely not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no interest in titles. I just wish to stay alive. I'm sorry. I am much more of use to "you here, I assure you. I would be a perpetually nervous paranoid wreck if I were to come with you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't even imagine you like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. We'll keep it that way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jarett, was there still a control of water going on while you were there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, for many long years, yes. The oasis is built around."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything we should know about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, most of it's controlled in the River District. A number of canals begin in the River "District. This is where there is the spring, the perpetual oasis that fuels the city, and many of "the caravans that travel to and from."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perpetual oasis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good note-taking, Grog. How do people greet each other there in Ank'Harel? Is there a "Kord's "strength be with you" thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is 'be pleased,' with a small bow, preferably with the hand down towards the stomach, "with the hand out. Be pleased."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beep-bleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bleep-bleep, yes. No stealing. Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Water is valuable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't drink the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything that's offensive? We don't want to offend anyone by accident.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm actually excited for you to see it. I'm very proud of it, had I not made some mistakes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we bring you anything back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know what? If you can, there is a special spice that is harvested not far from the "city. If you could find me some fusaka spice? Bring me a small-- not a lot, just a bit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it for food?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's for food, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would love to do that. We'll keep an eye out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a bit pricey. I can give you some--"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you've done way too much for us.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Fair trade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, I appreciate it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll work on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Work on it for a bit, maybe watch some folks. You'll pick it up right quick, just pay "attention."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, well, shall we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go change, and then let's be off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, be safe, friends. Look forward to your return."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep everyone safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is my purpose."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Jarett, will you keep an eye on Gilmore for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is he all right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he's just working himself a bit much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stretched a little thin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I may have noticed it myself. I will do this for you. Promise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My pleasure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Marquet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To market!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To buy a fine pig.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To market!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Home again, home again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This might be a bit difficult, to find a one-eyed merchant in a city bigger than Emon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that once we arrive, he'll find us. Or she.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get there, we start poking people in the eye until someone doesn't flinch, then we'll know we found them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I point out that now we have to learn an entirely new lore? We've worked so hard, and now spices? Rivers, canals, fusaka! Oh god, I'd gotten everything together, and now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've only got two weeks. Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It takes a day to do Disneyland.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone speak Marquetian, or do they speak Common there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll run into a lot of Common. Common is common for a reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys head back to Gilmore's place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but are we going to get some water jugs and shit like that before we leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, we get some water jugs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, more water's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can pick up a few. We'll say for about five gold pieces here, you can acquire some jugs that are compact enough that they'll actually fit within the Bag of Holding, should you place them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How we doing on potions? We got potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get some potions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no stores.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The healing potions that were available in the city you guys have already taken.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we've tapped them out there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Whitestone is not functioning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll get some in Marquet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trade them for water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One for each?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You stabbed her bear while maintaining eye contact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many jugs did we get? Five jugs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five jugs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Slowly. Very slowly. Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we fill up our wineskins with water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're changing out of the winters into the lighter clothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bust out some of my clothes from the Fire Ashari. Go lighter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a shame Kit's very busy, or else we could get summer clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's so busy getting married or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Getting married or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I break into a cold sweat, thinking about the desert and this armor. Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to be a gross, sweaty, greasy mess.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, actually there is a solution for this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, Percival. I have never needed your intellect more than right now. What is the solution?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to find him a white silk and cotton, linen cloak, very simple, to throw over his armor the way the Templars used to do, so you won't cook in your bloody armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does his little sachet--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it'll attach to the sachet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was going to say, does his sachet need a re-up of herbs? I thought you stuffed it with something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival presents you with a nice, flowing, light whitish-gray cloak. Ceremonial, within older Whitestone gatherings. It seems nice; it seems light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I can put it over everything else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Over your other cloaks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cloaks, plural. Fucking 90 episodes later: cloaks, cloaks, cloaks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can totally place it over your Displacer Cloak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's just a heat sink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's to bounce the heat off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Liam knows science. Vax doesn't know shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go, quickly, guys. I'm sorry. I haven't done this yet, so can I try to see where Kaylie is and do a little scry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You close your eyes and concentrate, and you see, peeking out from the metallic rim of the sword which you gave her, the Aberration's Bane longsword, you look up and you can see the edge of a wooden table. You hear faint music in the distance; it sounds like some sort of a piano being played. No accompaniment, just a straight piano. You hear distant whispers of conversation, the occasional burst of laughter, and you can see the edge of Kaylie's elbow, leaning against the edge of the table. There's a long pause, no movement. Then all of a sudden, she shifts back from the table and goes, "That's right, all the money on the table's mine. Nice try." Scoops down, throwing her hand of cards on the table. You hear a couple voices go (groaning). You see her scoop the coins over and go place them into a coin bag. "All right, so perhaps another round, then?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! She's doing good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches her hand up, watching the guy leave, and fist-bumps Dranzel. Your vision fades back and your consciousness comes back to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's okay! Okay, good! All right! I feel good. Let's go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What were you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had some bad tikka masala earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We haven't even gone to Marquet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't have Middle Eastern food there, I hope!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not going to touch that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you enter the room, he jolts back to momentary awareness. "All right! Gathered your things? Are you ready to go?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't mind." He grabs the edge of the central table in the center of the room with the tea on it. He looks towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, no problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "All right, it won't last long. In you go!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Running through!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Gilmore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My pleasure!" is the last thing you hear before you dive in as it begins to fade. Each of you guys step into and transition past, immediately piling up into each other as you come out the other side, as you're in a dark and enclosed cupboard or closet-type circumstance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm reaching for a door handle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a giant armoire. You guys are pushed into it, but it is latched over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh, Grog's pec is right in my eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get a little dagger through and flip the latch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flick it up. It bursts open, and you all come stumbling out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he stabbed my eye out! Jeez!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a very large dresser-like armoire. It's empty. It looks like there are a number of hangers inside, like it was a place for various outfits to be kept and stored. On the floor of the wood, you can see carved into it a small symbol or a

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Drink!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marked as the symbol he put.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing no one destroyed this thing while he was gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, you can see a small dark wood room atop a wine-red circular carpet in the center. Empty shelves and cobwebs fill the corners. There's a bit of dust and sand coating over where the bed rests against the wall. A closed window hides behind a drawn curtain, with a little bit of peeking sunlight making its way through. There is one single door that sees you out, though it is currently closed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stand on the carpet and will it to fly. Seems worth a shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every carpet here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Step onto the carpet, close your eyes. How do you will it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do believe in fairies. I

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moments pass, no effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do my due diligence and make sure the door's okay. Probably is, but just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to look out the window, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look under the bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22. Just to make sure that it's not trapped or locked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're peeking out the window, you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Casual civilians. Darker skin, looks like they've definitely been living in the desert for a long time. That is what you can see from the window's point of view.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we on the first floor or second floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you're on the first floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a second floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there stairs? Oh, we're in a room. Let's go out the room. What could happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking under the bed, you see what appears to be a small wooden box that is closed and hidden toward the very back, and what appears to be a small series of shirts that have been folded up and have gathered a lot of dust over the top of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I reach them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Pull them out. Really nice, high-quality silk and cotton based, embroidered shirts. Look more ceremonial, special event type, long, maybe knee-length.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the decoration like in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, it's pretty bland. You can see a couple of colored tapestries similar to the center of the floor rug that are hanging, but there are a lot of blank areas. It looks like decorations have been removed, or at least haven't been there for a long time. The room, for the most part, seems to be abandoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the box trapped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Almost good, and then not. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? It does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I open it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Open it up, glance inside. It looks to be a series of folded papers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Gilmore's stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just seeing if this is his room!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, whispers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shitballs. I have to move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are those Cowboys doing, Travis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten-ten, halftime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh snap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a good thing, ten-ten at halftime?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not good? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Their starting quarterback got hurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I understood all those words individually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he's an old woman.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know those words, as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speaking in Half-Orc. Don't speak that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would pay good money to have you explain how football works to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I was going with that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I fold them back up and I put them under the bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I read your diary, then? Is that all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was seeing if we were in Gilmore's room, that's all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't act like I'm a dick. I'm not stealing the letters. I'm putting the shirts back, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't say it! Just maybe he wants a little privacy. I don't know! Think about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's learned from you well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the door open? Can we go out of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you find anything good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If 25 opens the door, then it's opened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's easy enough, like butter. (creaking door) The door opens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He did say we would meet his family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An older couple, with dark sun-weathered skin, graying hair, and bright eyes. They look confused and slightly scared at their table, staring back at people wandering into the middle of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a bit awkward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're friends of Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shaun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look at each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, be pleased.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bees knees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both look to each other and then immediately begin, mouths filled with food, laughing. (laughs) "This is unexpected. Friends of Shaun's, you say?"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one said Shaun?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore and Shaun. Approaches you, as you, stepping forward as one of the more, you know, assertive members of the party, and goes, "How is he? If you could please tell me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's quite well. He's very powerful, actually, and has wonderful businesses, all through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tal'Dorei?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I know. It's just not there anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "I am sorry. Let me introduce. I am Soren Geddmore. This is Opesa Geddmore. You know our son?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, for quite some time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you say he does well with his business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does. So well, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Continental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is good."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very respected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, and brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He has always been a brave one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Single-handedly protecting a whole city right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you like to eat with us? We can make more "food, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, we need to head out pretty quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're sadly on a mission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you tell us the direction to Ank'Harel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are going to Ank'Harel?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Continue... what is the word you speak?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: North, northwest. No, northeast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is west. You want to north, so go that way. Yes. That is where you want to go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a road to follow, or is it just a direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't been in many years. As far as I know, there are signs. There are not roads. There "are guides you could hire to bring you there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do like a nature check or take note of what he said so I remember? Because that was vague.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm assuming these are the people that Gilmore said I would know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense these are probably who he was referring to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, so as she's doing that, I want to pull out the locket and say, actually, Shaun asked me to deliver this to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over to him and shows him. You get a bit of a glance, at that point. You can see it's a picture of Gilmore. He's happy. Jewel-encrusted rings. It's almost a promotional still, if there was one, for Gilmore's Glorious Goods. She takes it. She closes it and goes, "Gilmore is originally "Geddmore. He changed his name when he went for better business to the Tal'Dorei place. Glad he's "doing well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's respected across the continent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything we can let him know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give him our love and tell him he is more than welcome to visit. It has been many years."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a worry. Safe travels. You're sure you don't wish to have food?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but if you could point us towards fusaka? Is there any around here? There's not, is there?

lines.name: MATT
