lines.text: She's quite strong, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some call her a warrior merchant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Warrior? If you're looking for warrior merchants, you're probably looking for the "Scarbearers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that sounds about right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she is a Scarbearer. Are they around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this definitely narrows down your search. The Debt's Respite is where you'll want to "go. It's actually run by one of the heads of their ilk."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ilk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not an animal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Scarbearers. They're a bit of a rough-and-tumble lot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They hunt for coin, sell what else they find. Odd jobs. Some of them maybe not the most up "and legal, but they work with a guarantee, and the head of their troop I think runs, or at least "partially owns, the Debt's Respite."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. What are you smoking at the moment, by the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just about to ask her the same thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dusk Blossom Sage."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very fragrant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pungent would be the world you're looking for."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your people do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the Earth Ashari do, and the Fire Ashari sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've done this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I stayed with the Earth Ashari for a few months. You want to try? It's fun. It's very nice. It relaxes you. Oh, come on guys! We've got time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We never take time for ourselves. Come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got a ticking time bomb!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just 15 minutes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cards said our luck. Perhaps this is a good way to ignite it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 minutes. Please, Vex, pretty please!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are still waiting for Scanlan to get here, and then we'll take him to the next stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, by the way, is right behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. Didn't mean to sneak up on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now we really need to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we have some more Dusk Sage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Something stronger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her eyes roll. "I mean no offense, but this is my 'me' time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, of course!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get our own! We'll get our own little booth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put a gold coin on her tray. So you can keep smoking, and thank you for the time spent in our company.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the coin, flicks it back to you and goes, "I appreciate, but do not require your "patronage."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grateful for your time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I like her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thanks, mom. It is burned into my head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Getting our own?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we go get our own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a nice place to get away. You can hear the distant sounds of the city, but for the most part, there's a soft violin music that plays towards the center of the area, so at least it has a nice atmosphere to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we're in there, do we notice anyone with any large scars walking around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This'll go great. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People with scars all over. Life out here can be a little tough at times, but no more scarred than most of the people you've encountered in your lifetime. And definitely nowhere near as scarred as the people you've run with for half of your lifetime.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are no really large, scarred people in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know. Thank you, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, can I see that ruby you found before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have no ruby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'd hold out on me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. There was no ruby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you lying to me, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, Little Teeny is my friend. All right? He spoke to me out of the deserts of fate, and he is mine and mine alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spice dealer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I want to hear this story.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I made contact. I'm supposed to meet up tonight in the casino one hour after sunset. I'm supposed to wear red. I will not lie, I am shitting myself, I'm so nervous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to wear red?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, how else will they discern who I am? I don't want to go alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'll go with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you cool?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I'm cool. I'm so cool, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, what do you mean? We're cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to draw too much attention, but I want to be safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (loudly) Are you buying drugs? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could not be happier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What an episode! What an episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's so many valuable lessons that can be learned at any moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think maybe the reason Jarett was almost arrested was because of this fucking spice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's precisely what happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the hell was he thinking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we're going to do it smarter. We're going to do it better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're not! (laughs) He's legitimately smarter than us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do this. But I need some backup. Maybe Vax could come and he could wear red. And he could be the guy who--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aren't they going to be looking for a very little man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll wear the red, but maybe you could be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go with you, and I will hang back, and I will be there to stab out the eyes of anyone who wants to hurt you, but you are the talker, man. You've always been the talker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why does Scanlan never think I'm very cool? Why does he think that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I think you're great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You never want me to go with you, I could've helped you find Kaylie, and you didn't ask me to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's be real. She's the coolest one in the group, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The big pointy hat, it's really dorky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the one who fucking makes me wear this thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can she take it off at the casino, though?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not flying. I can take it off whenever I fucking want!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we all come? It sounds super dangerous. I just want to watch. I'll be so sly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are, by the way, walking to our next destination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I am enjoying my hookah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I forgot we got hookah. Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're sitting and hookah-ing through this whole fucking thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did it before, but I don't think I really did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a split hose? We have a split hose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, thanks. I'm straight-edge tonight. I've got to think clearly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just tobacco, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it just tobacco? We really don't actually know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, that's a good point. I do a few test puffs. Is it just tobacco? Is there something special about this hookah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be just delightfully flavored tobacco.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a cigar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I copy Keyleth. (coughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, brother. Good job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happened to you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just, (coughs, sniffs) I can't stop (coughs) coughing. (coughs) I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a little dry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (coughs) It's really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, you've never looked cooler in your entire life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a bar in this place? A proper bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really a bar. It seems the servants take orders and bring you your various liquid imbibements.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Can I flag down a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You see a man walks up to you, long dark curly hair, bit of a goatee growing. "How "can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm royalty from a far-off land. I pride myself on trying the fiercest spirit in the area that I'm visiting. What do you guys pride yourself on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want the Sandkheg's Hide."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sandcake side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Sandkheg's Hide."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, hide. Oh, is it a food or a drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a drink."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, then one of those'd be great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's expensive."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well, don't tell anybody but I'm super fucking rich. Only because I have to check with my national treasury, how much is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, do you wish to have a glass or a bottle?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A bottle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A bottle will run you 350 gold pieces."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walks off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How have we not stopped this?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes back with two very full-- (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's from your personal fucking funds!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We be clubbing, motherfuckers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That ain't no party funds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are gold coins. You're not making it rain, you're making it hail, for god's sakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that get to come with us, or is it bottle service? Because if this is bottle service, we're here for the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, maybe there's champagne though, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes back a little later with these two dark green glass wine bottles that have this heavy leather wrapped around them and bolted together at certain places. It looks like leather at times, but as you get closer, you feel it's actually hard. It's almost like a chitinous armor on the outside of the glass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This was meant for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here you are."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! May I start a tab? No? Fine. Then I give, shit. (mutters) How much do I owe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: TRAVIS 700. Here's 800 gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you very much, and please, do let me know if you require anything else."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he exits the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have never hated you so much before, in my entire life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prepare to drink like kings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel the opposite way. I'm very proud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Grog, I think this bottle's more well-armored than we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's like amazing animal-skin Maker's Mark. So how do we crack this bitch open?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, I need you to be clear-headed tonight!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having a glass of this. We've just paid a fortune for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're saving a bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are saving a bottle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Are there any opening utensils around, because I don't want to unsheathe--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I sword it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sword it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But don't take your sword out, because we're not allowed to bring our weapons out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, there's no weapon in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're currently private in the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're private in the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought this was an open tent-commune thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an open ceiling, but there are rooms segmented by cloth and what looks like sandstone walls, so there are little pockets and alcoves, and you guys currently have one that you're in right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not no weapons, it's just no usage of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's keep them sheathed, he said at the gate. But we are pretty hidden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll just pop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes off, and the cork flies and bounces off one of the nearby walls. The smell that comes to you is extremely strong. It resembles a very vinegar turned wine mixed with this, for lack of a better term, a very earthy scent. It's almost herbal, medicinal. It's not at all what you would have expected for something so expensive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to be first? Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fill me up. Oh wait, you want me to go first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want a shot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival just took some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it touches your tongue, that smell transitions into a very acidic taste. It actually burns your tongue, and it goes numb within a matter of seconds. It is not a delightful flavor, and as the tongue goes numb, the back of the throat goes numb as you swallow. As the numbness continues down the rest of the body, the flavor has not improved at all, but it brings this universal numbness. And as the slight pain of the burn subsides, you, with just but a few sips, become extremely intoxicated, but also just numb.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: How is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slurring) Not very good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slurring) But if--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's fucking wasted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slap him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That felt really good. I'll do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liquid MDMA.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take a sip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not drinking mine. Here, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to know! I take a sip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elements of this remind you of being very drunk, with but a few sips.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much. Where we're from, usually when purchasing such a great and expensive item, room service is included. I'm assuming we have somewhere to stay for the night?

lines.text: (slurring) I don't think that it's that kind of place.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (slurring) We have to move.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Okay. Who's leading the charge for that?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 investigation check. Within ten minutes you've asked the right questions between a number of various street urchins and street salespersons, to be directed straight towards the

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In following the direction, you end up walking up to what looks like a rather rundown-looking establishment. The broken glass windows and missing front door lead you to think that perhaps it's been abandoned for months. Looks a little rough and ramshackle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But they said this was being guarded by the Hand of Ord. Interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My contact in the underworld said that this was a place that is a known hangout for seedy types. Right? Am I remembering that correctly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the guard at the front of the city told us this was one of the places that you could stay, and it was guarded.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He said it was a place you could stay, because you were asking for taverns and inns.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have accounts from two different people, and they're two different opinions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like Yelp. But better. I'm going to knock. (knocking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The interior is familiar and probably closer to the taverns you're used to in more of the poorer districts of Emon and surrounding cities than some of the more luxurious areas you've recently found yourselves in. Vax, Vex, and Keyleth-- actually, Keyleth, make a perception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw. I see why you're doing that. With disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex and Vax, as you guys walk into the room, you do catch off in the distance behind a series of barrels that are stacked and the edge of a shelf that contains rows and rows of glasses, tankards, plates, and various things. You just barely make out what looks to be an androgynous figure, face masked with dark blue and black cloth, with a hint of leather armor, hiding in the corner. Like barely visible to you and you can make out the details due to your very keen ability to gather your surroundings quickly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the armor similar to that suit of armor we saw on the other guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. This is very muddled, low leather armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't tell; their back's hidden, and they're quiet.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hang by the two sobering-up twins over here and keep an eye on that person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys also watch throughout all the various patrons and people that are wandering about this establishment, one figure stands out amongst the others. You see a bronze-scaled dragonborn: bulky and thick, muscular armored in light hides and bracers. He clutches an untouched mug that is brimming with an amber-colored ale and is lost in thought, staring off towards one of the broken windows that leads outside. Very heavy, muscular arms. Maybe not quite the height of Grog, but definitely a similar build.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tail or no tail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting down, you can't tell.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: "You would speak to Treev," and points to the dragonborn, who is currently staring out of the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's spacing out. As soon as you approach he goes, (groans) "What do you want, bothering a "fellow in mid-fantasy?"

lines.text: "At this rate, sure. I doubt I'm going to find myself back to that dream. Anyway, what do "you and your rather scrawny-looking friend there have to say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It

lines.text: "No. God no. I don't know where you're from in Emon or what the prices are there, but here, "it's expensive."

lines.text: "She's one of our finest, and expensive because of it. But friend, she's been off for a "week since her last job, so mayhaps her schedule is open. Would have to inquire. Write me a summary "of your job you have for her. I'll have it delivered. Her answer may take a week or so."

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our business is our business. If you don't like it, shove off, find someone else."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, I can get word to her immediately, but it's up to her when she wants to respond."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything else you can tell me about her?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've weathered beasts. We've weathered dragons here in Emon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not like we've seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So be it. But nevertheless, you want to hire her, you've got to write her a proposal." And he slides across a piece of parchment with a small quill about it. "I'll deliver it, and she'll get "back to you when she sees fit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have a normal price?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on the job you're asking. She'll set her price."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 perception? The figure is watching all of you intensely but has not moved an inch. All you've seen are the eyes move, but they've been trained on your entire group since you arrived.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I ask, (coughs) other than gambling, what sort of entertainment can you find in this city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All sorts of entertainment. There's various singers, musicians, dancers, performers. If you're "looking for company there's all sorts of entertainment in that regard, of all the "spectrums. If you're looking for games, probably a few months out before we get to any sort of the "gladiatorial events."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, could you just, a bit more on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's months away."

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: "Well, you could certainly find a scrap, but none that are sanctioned by the Hand, and they'll "put you away."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, big man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lest you have someone to duel you. That's a whole different business."

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's sanctioned by the law."

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you challenge one to a duel and they accept, aye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In this city, it's legal? Anytime? High noon, midnight, when?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to make sure that you both agree to fight "to the death, and the fight has to happen in the Bowl of Judgment."

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: The Bowl of Judgment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sits about the Sandherald district outside of the Cerulean Palace."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, is that that super fucking tall thing we saw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the Cerulean Palace. It's quite close to it, aye."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any items allowed in the bowl, or do you have to go in bare-handed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It depends on the sanctions of the Ord and the agreement you come to, but fisticuffs are "great for the gladiatorial events, but if you're fighting to the death, sometimes it's nice to "bring a blade in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what type of people like to participate in these duels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those kind. Doesn't happen often. When it does happen, it's a spectacle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there like a lighter fight that can be found?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arm wrestling match.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Arm wrestling or-- I don't know, what would be worse less than--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: UFC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Less than a Bowl of Judgment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cup of Truth? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A Wok of Truth, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bowl of Wheaties.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is really uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few months until the games begin, but until then, that's about the only way you'll find "bloodshed here. At least that won't lend you up in prison."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting and I'm starting to compose a letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's his handwriting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flouncy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to gain it back. What do you write?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to show everybody before I hand it in. I'm going to write the truth, top to bottom, of the world is peril, we are facing a battle, and she holds or knows of an item that would turn the tide, and I wish to know its price or know its rental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you asking her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like that's not going to work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding it. Before I hand it in I'm going to show. I don't feel that there is any deceit-- there is nothing I can think to say beyond the truth. We are either dealing with honest people, or we are not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling that... yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also putting my rank and title and letting them know that I'm willing to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give away Vex's title?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm willing to give away Vex. Vex is entirely up for sale. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're planning to recruit this person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking to rent or buy an object that she owns, or perhaps even trade, and we'll put 400 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to meet with her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to meet with her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As an offer of a meeting.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it. He packages in in a small container, a leather container.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you put in there that it had to be prompt? That it had to be prompt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that time is of the essence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, don't worry." (whistles) Whistles through his fingers and the figure in the wall that you'd been watching steps forward and slowly walks towards the table. Holds up the scroll, and the figure leans in. Covers his mouth and he whispers into the ear of the figure. The figure takes the scroll, gives a nod to all of you, and walks out of the tavern. "He'll deliver that to her "promptly, now be on your way. 15 gold."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, of course! Thank you for the rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a keyring out and starts fudging through the keys, pulls a few off and tosses them to you across the table. "All right, you've got it for a night."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I heard Grog. I'm going to follow out the door, go stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You vanish out the door. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Okay. As you glance out the door and pull outside-- you're going stealth as well, you said? Roll stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Okay. You turn around the corner just as you see a flash of dark cloth around the edge of the Debt's Respite. You rush off to the edge and look around the corner way and down the alley. You can see the figure, full on, arms out to the side rushed behind, going into a very fast run, down the shaded hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaded hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you continue to follow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At a distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Following the masked figure, you continue to give chance. It darts erratically, zig-zagging between areas. You can see this is a very trained pattern to lose anybody following them, but you're also trained in following those that wish not to be followed. Make another perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come around one corner, and you can see there's a wall that ends there, and you see just a little slip of material pass. And as you glance over, you can see the figure has jumped down onto a lower walkway onto what appears to be a recessed sector of this part of Ank'Harel, and has already darted beneath a nearby bridge and overpass that walks across to another series of buildings. You leap over, keeping in the shadow, and give chase down that way. You turn around underneath the bridge and you can see underneath the bridge, there is an archway that leads into a dark path down an actual hallway beneath the series of buildings you just saw ahead of you. Make another perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Doesn't seem to make notice, and then darts off, leaping, leaping up onto a rooftop and vanishing off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said, "A Kingly Home"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Kingly Home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to stealth back to the Debt's Respite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping a very close watch on the path you took and marking it mentally back to the Debt's Respite. It's probably a good mile off from where you guys were, if not a little further. You guys continue your conversation, go about your own business. Eventually, Vax returns with the information, the path of wherever this letter was dropped off to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just curious, have you ever had the Sandkheg Hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you serious?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm just asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I ain't drinking that bullshit."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too stiff for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Too stiff for anyone! It's-- what?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I hear only real bosses can drink that jazz.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's not a drink. That's probably squeezed from the arsehole of some sort of beast "out in the desert. I prefer my stuff taken from berries and the sweet stuff."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, some beast? Who'd make a drink out of some animal's whatever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you have some, have you tasted it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I guess you know what an animal's bum tastes like, eh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sputters) Hold on. You mean they squeeze the asshole of something out there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, completely!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They hold it down and just squeeze its abdomen and the whole sandkheg spews out into this little "glass barrel and then you pay for it. Top dollar."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's 300 something gold!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, did you buy some?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You brain is filled with image of whatever creature your imagination has come up with being held down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a giant, hairy water yak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is squeezing some sort of yellowish liquid from its abdomen into a glass wine bottle, and you're now looking over at Percy and Keyleth who had just had sips of this earlier. It's not sitting well with your stomach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were gifted a bottle, and a couple of my friends had partook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cackles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They say the stuff we had is A-plus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax now appears at the edge of the table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. Took a little walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for the rooms. Breakfast? Is there breakfast here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scoffs) "No, you find your own food."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he still have some drink in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't been filled since, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys head to your rooms? Okay. You make your way up to the rooms. They're all clean, serviceable, nothing too fancy, but functional rooms. Each with two beds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to check for anything unusual, if there's anything iffy about the rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I would follow suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. Nothing seems to be out of place or out of the ordinary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Seems to be a room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to check under the beds, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. You find dust, dead insects, a dried-out rodent husk, and that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, you want to bunk up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Are we going two to a room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's six of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's also about 3:00 in the afternoon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that. I'm not going to go lie down on the floor. I just thought I'd call dibs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, then. Me and you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm kidding. I don't want to be in the same room with you at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I need a bucket and a mop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. You're with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm with Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have fun!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With-- not-- no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so we've got a backup plan because I followed whoever that person was back to where they dropped off. We should probably honor the offer first. If that goes sideways, then we have a backup plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so rare that we're actually given an opportunity to be honest about everything. We might as well try it once, see if we like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do you know where this person receives her messages?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I remember what it looked like. If you want to follow me, it's about a mile off. It looked like a furniture store. A Kingly Rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you didn't even have to say jenga!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wonders never cease.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A Kingly Rest. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't get Grog in a fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a red shirt, Scanlan? Do we need to get you one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we own anything red? Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have anything red?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have three fancy robes left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not own a red shirt, but you could probably find one. Not too difficult.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll find one. Take 20 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't take you too long. Costs you two silver pieces. You find a nice red shirt, billowing sleeves. It's totally up your alley.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go back out to the bazaar? Are far from there, or are we still close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's gone through the bazaar. You're not too far from it. Maybe a ten-minute walk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They sell any weapons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And potions. We need potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinkets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look and see if people are selling weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk around. and there are weapons being sold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any exotic weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Most weapons you find here are ornamental; they're for decoration. They're for putting above mantelpieces. There are various blades that have bolting mechanisms in the back where you can easily mount them to a wall. None of them, that you can see, at least, that are open in this bazaar for sale, are presented as an actual item for warfare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a magic shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Asking about, you do come to, within the bazaar, a small wooden building that's like a hut, but it's constructed of dark wood panels. It resembles those strange marionette performance boxes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Punch and Judy box, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's eagerly looking out with a sign in the front that reads, "Oddities and Eccentricities."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be pleased to you as well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm stocked up on eccentricities, but if you have any oddities for sale, I'd be very interested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are many oddities at my disposal. I'm Nisaba."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Percival. Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What kind of oddities are you looking for?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly, this is my first time in the city, and I'm trying to get a sense of what's available for sale and what sorts of things one would find in the city, so really, I'm interested in touring your stock, especially if you have anything exotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, let me show you." Over the next five minutes, she brings out all sorts of strange knickknacks. It's essentially a display from the most awkward of vintage Salvation Armies you've ever come across.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, we've found a hipster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do catch a quick flash of what appears to be some small crystalline vials that appear to be strapped to some sort of leather bandolier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's interesting. What do you call that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is for, well, a gentleman who passed through many years ago, who claimed to be a great "alchemist, sold this off when he had come into a lot of debt within the city, so I made a good "price. No one has really showed much interest in it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting. May I? May I take a look at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chemicals inside-- one of them does have a familiar color, a deep herbal red. This looks to be some sort of a low to medium level healing potion, most likely, from your experience in the use of that. The two others are grayish and murky and don't really draw your attention or anything you're familiar with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, what's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. It's quite nice, though, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. Can I do a check on the other two potions to see with my potion knowledge? My potion sense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad. Just straight intelligence? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. They do appear to have been prepared in the way that you prepare magically enchanted vials for potions themselves, but you're not really able to make out just at a glance. You'd have to spend quite a time to make out what their nature is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd have to look at it. Not familiar, sorry. That looks like a health potion, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It does look a bit--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Healthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like Storage Wars. Just buy it. Who knows what's in there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you hoping to unload for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, knowing that is now a magic potion of healing and two other magical potions, that is a "very valuable belt with its contents. I would sell you just the belt for five silver pieces. To "include the vials, and they do come as a set, unfortunately, that would run you 275 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, see, we don't know what kind of healing potion that is, and those other two vials could have-- there is an expiration date on those things. And how long have you had it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've had it for a number of years."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A number of years? Well, in that case, they've probably gone stale by now. I would say 75 gold at the very best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "That is not going to work." She reaches out and takes the belt away from you and sets it back down on the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 75 gold will not do you for that, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the belt, maybe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the belt, obviously. We've already established that that's in the silver range and certainly not touching the gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, but you're willing to have and to offer that 75 gold for it, please."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 75 gold for the entire set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's not going to work. I'm sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, and of course that makes sense that a hundred gold for that entire set would be very fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm starting to take a nap against a column standing up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just buy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 100 gold. You've had it for so long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to go terribly. Where's my persuasion? Ooh, that's almost a number. Oh, good. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "225 gold for the set."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 200. And an acknowledgement and compliment to your stunning hair. I'm attempting to flirt very poorly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) That eyebrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a charisma check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a straight charisma modifier to your roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on. 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You flirted with grass better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "I appreciate your patronage, but I am a patient woman, and that is how I hold "business." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stonewalled!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I should have learned some sort of lesson here. I'm just not entirely sure what it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you know--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hardly matters, I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you'll come to it at the end of being in Ank'Harel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, guys. I had a thought. You know we were all supposed to have a meeting with the king? And I haven't been paying attention if anyone's watching, and we got time to kill. Should we go have a talk with the big man?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or at least put in for an audience.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Who knows if they'll even get to us today?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sobering up a bit. Which we should probably do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it seem like a long walk towards the Cerulean Palace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a 45-minute to an hour walk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got hours and hours before we have to do anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do. It's 4:00 in the afternoon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time's the sun set here? Can I ask somebody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ask around. It looks to probably be about four hours from sunset.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Fine. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, the best way to see a new city is to walk, you guys!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, hold on. I have to open my Pokémon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like there are actual pockets of grass and gardens that exist around the Cerulean Palace in here. The topography changes almost to feel like it belongs entirely anywhere but the middle of the desert. The guards do eye you suspiciously as you approach, and you watch as one armored woman, her dark hair hidden mostly beneath an ornate helmet of brass and blue, approaches you guys. "Welcome to the Cerulean Palace. I must ask "your business here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forgive us for our intrusion. We come seeking an audience of J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our emperor does not take meetings. My apologies, but I must ask you to leave."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are, in fact, a group of ambassadors from the continent of Emon, from the cities of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Continent of Tal'Dorei, city of Emon. It concerns the fate of the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that one. That one. See? Listen to me. I'm not taking credit for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman steps forward with a smile, and unlike the abrasive appearance that most of the Hand have given, she seems to be more welcoming, and gives, for the first time since you've been here, a very formal welcoming bow with her hand before her, the other hand out. Says, "Be pleased, everyone."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, enter and follow me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's the what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gameshega?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Gameshega.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gameshega?

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Gameshega.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is good. This is very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are eventually brought to a very intricate and decorated waiting room, with some finely upholstered silk chairs, couches. The Grand Maven stops. "If you would not mind, please have a seat."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks into a nearby doorway. It looks like a single door that leads into a small-looking room, from the brief moment you have to see it. The door closes and you hear a (magic sound). Two minutes pass. Five minutes pass. Ten eerie, quiet minutes pass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Windows in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No windows in this particular room, but you notice as you take a close look, the roofs, while they are built of this deep blue, almost glass-like thick crystal, they're ever so slightly translucent, and it gives this general blue glow about the entire room. You can't make out any details from the outside, but there is this strange translucence to the entire structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that the only door to the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the hallway that you left behind, but there standing in the doorway is the same Hand that approached you guys and has been keeping an eye the entire time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's in the room with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is away from you, standing in the large archway hall that led you into this waiting room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up and pacing the room, trying to pace near the door that she went through so I can keep an ear on the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really should have peed before I came in. Is there a privy I could use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She glances at you. "You look like a strapping young man. Perhaps you can hold onto "that for a time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks that way, but I also have a strapping-sized bladder, and I've been known to leave strapping-sized messes in corners. You see, I don't really come from all this finery, so the side of the wall is just as good with me. It's just I'm trying to be polite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She leans behind the hallway. (foreign language) "Just a moment." Another guard walks up behind and kicks a bucket into the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put up or shut up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hear anything from the other side of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm laughing out loud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your ear up against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't want to have my ear against the wall. I wanted to be subtly doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're subtly doing it, and there's nothing. You get closer and closer, and there's nothing. The rest of you hear (magic sounds), but you're still-- Eventually, the door opens again, and there the Grand Maven stands again. She looks up to the rest of you. "Come with me. You have "been granted an audience." She steps back into the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That happened much easier than I expected.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for the bucket. I'll hold it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure, Grog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were convincing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They must know who we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trust our luck. Our luck is going. I'm walking into this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone says jenga, kill everyone we meet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the only plan we have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk into what is a cylindrical chamber of smooth blue-purple quartz-like material with four strands of heavy chains taut between the ceiling and floor, about 15 feet above you. No other exit. You all enter and the door closes behind you, the Maven still relaxing, her arms to her side, her headdress still giving her this ominous presence. Looks up, and there's a (impact) shuddering sound. Suddenly, the bland, uncharacteristic walls, compared to the rest of the palace, begin to slide past the chains, now making this rattling sound as the floor itself seems to be lurching. You feel a bit of pressure in the room that wasn't there before. You're all being lifted, and the walls, now no longer walled in by the rest of the palace, you can now see this occasional traveling-down line as the spiral on the outside of the tower you once saw now surrounds you. The walls are much thinner than the rest of the palace, as you can see through this somewhat-translucent glass exterior the entirety of Emon surrounding you from upon high as it goes lower and lower as you're lifted higher and higher into this tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is miraculous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very off-putting, but beautiful at the same time. Everything's seen through this shimmering, somewhat-refracted blue passage. As you go higher and higher, you can see the countless homes, walls, and towers getting smaller and smaller, other towers eventually ending as you go higher in the tower. The Maven says, "I request you do not touch the walls, please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really want to touch the walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome to Ank'Harel, heroes of Tal'Dorei. I am J'mon Sa Ord, and it is my pleasure to greet you." And that is where we'll pick up our session in two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, two weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two weeks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two weeks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, guys. We did a lot of strange things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, that was a weird day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the pharaoh king from Stargate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We have two weeks until we pick up from that point in the story. Next week, look forward once again to Liam running his awesome one-shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got a party planned for you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be awesome. It's been fun. But anyway, guys, thank you so much. Hope you had a fun time. Much love to all of you in the community. You're awesome; thank you so much for your support. Thank you for supporting our wonderful charities. 826 has been awesome, and they keep showing up. We saw recently in Target ads, actually, which is fantastic, so thank you guys so much for keeping up with them. You can still give them money. You can still support 826LA, as well as any of the other charities we have listed in our Guide to Critmas on the website. Those are great ways to give and great ways to support all of these wonderful people out there doing wonderful things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And thank you, Loot Crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And thank you, Loot Crate, for your support of this show and support of our community, giving them an awesome discount. However, most of us will now adjourn to finish signing the posters forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us are done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some of us will be doing it until the end of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing for a lot of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we finishing tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This batch will go out soon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The desert awaits, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The desert waits for us, and it is much needed. Much love to you all. Have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? [music]
